body_text:
When editing a recipe that was just created, there seem to be multiple versions of the recipe added to the Redux store. The extra versions don't end up on the server.
Steps to reproduce:

In the control interface, create a new recipe
Without leaving the page, make a change to the recipe.
Click the "Recipes" bread crumb to go back to the listing. Notice that there are multiple copies of the recipe that was just created, equal to the number of times the recipe was changed.
Refresh the page. The recipes go away.

title: control: Ghost recipes made when updating just-created recipe
body:
When editing a recipe that was just created, there seem to be multiple versions of the recipe added to the Redux store. The extra versions don't end up on the server.

Steps to reproduce:

1. In the control interface, create a new recipe
2. Without leaving the page, make a change to the recipe.
3. Click the "Recipes" bread crumb to go back to the listing. Notice that there are multiple copies of the recipe that was just created, equal to the number of times the recipe was changed.
4. Refresh the page. The recipes go away.
